title: Soichiro Honda
summary: Soichiro Honda (本田 宗一郎, Honda Sōichirō, 17 November 1906 – 5 August 1991)  was a Japanese engineer and industrialist.[1] In 1948, he established Honda Motor Co., Ltd. and oversaw its expansion from a wooden shack manufacturing bicycle motors to a multinational automobile and motorcycle manufacturer.[3]
